New Records: C Zimbabwe won the match by 13 runs.

Pre-Game Insights: C India fielded a young team with three debutants.

Post-Match Reflections: C Shubman Gill expressed frustration with the team's performance.
C Washington Sundar was praised for his contributions despite the loss.
